alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 26 at 3:25AM CST until February 27 at 8:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...HEAVY WINTRY MIX OF PRECIPITATION ARRIVING LATE TONIGHT INTO EARLY MONDAY... .A strong low pressure system will spread heavy mixed precipitation across central and northern Wisconsin late tonight into Monday. Significant ice and snow accumulations are possible. Strong east winds will develop late tonight into Monday, then shift to the northwest Monday evening, leading to the possibility of tree and power line damage. There is still some uncertainty in the forecast, as small changes in temperature could significantly alter precipitation type, and how much snow and ice accumulates. Widespread hazard travel is expected on Monday. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches and ice accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Langlade, Lincoln, Oneida, Menominee, Northern Oconto County, Shawano, and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Snow covered and icy roads are likely. Travel could be very difficult or impossible at times. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this winter storm.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Lincoln; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Shawano; Southern Oconto County
